title: @Riot Repertoire, what's the deal with the skarner update you said was coming a few months ago?

embed.description: Hi all, I know this is long overdue, but we wanted to get this design followup out there and available to the public so everyone knows how we currently feel about Skarner following his changes in the Juggernaut update last year.

body: Is there any news on what's gonna happen to skarner? A few months ago you were saying that you were gonna make his spires have less mind share and update his stat profile to match that of a diver or vanguard. Were these changes scrapped or are they still in the works, and if so when can we expect to see these changes? I know a few months ago you said that it would be in the near future, is this still the case? Thank you!

replies.body:
Hi, thanks for the post! And sorry for going silent on the matter.

I have some stuff saved up and sitting locally on my machine. Maybe I can throw something up on the PBE following the worlds patch or something, but I don't want to disturb any of the end of season balance work going on.

Hopefully I can get a chance to get it out there as we approach the pre-season patch, but either way, I'll try and give an update as to where it's at even if we decide not to.

Would we be able to have any insight as to what you view his problems to be as a whole?

IMO his passive gates his power and position flexibility, do you agree or disagree? Why?/why not?
If not, what do you believe to be his main problems? 


If yes...
Is there any chance of a kit revert? I know riot tends to not take this approach, however i feel there is nothing that can replace/ improve his passive without it still being meh compared to the original.
Apples to apples, the old kit was simply better, both mechanically and asthetically.

If not, could we have some insight as to the potential direction so we can better understand your thought processes? 

Any insight would be awesome, and thanks for dropping by.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Enighten me mah princess  <3 
If the rocks are gone and his q gives ms. What will you replace his passive with that isn't a boring bundle of stats and fits him thematically like his old crystal venom passive did?

Am curious cos i haven't been able to come up with anything else and I've been pondering a potential replacement for ages

I guess I'll give it a shot for you Sir Knight.
--------------------
Passive:
**Energize** (termed so as a hat tip to oldest passive)
While an enemy is stunned with Fracture or suppressed with Impale, Skarner gains 70 - 120 (based on level) bonus movement speed, 43 - 160 (based on level)% bonus attack speed and restores 2% maximum mana every second.
-------------------
Q:
**Crystal Slash**
ACTIVE: Skarner deals physical damage to all enemies within range.

PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 40% Bonus AD)
Hitting an enemy with Crystal Slash grants Skarner bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, and causes subsequent casts to deal bonus magic damage.

「 BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 / 16% 」 「 BONUS MOVEMENT SPEED: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% 」

「 BONUS MAGIC DAMAGE: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 20% AP) 」
Basic attacks reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.5 seconds (doubled to 1 against enemy champions)

-------------------
His base stats need shifting accordingly though for spire loss.

However, I am not certain if the movespeed on Q should all be on Q 
or if after 3 stacks he should become energized so it'll give more of 
the ramping feel that crystal venom Skarner had :/
The Energized at 3 would tie it in completely with his kit I think.  Not sure if broken lol.

Think the move speed would HAVE to only trigger at 3, otherwise he'd be way to fast with ms/as built into 2 of his spells and ms on W without all 3 being underwhelming to compensate.

Apart from that, pretty snazzy. And what was his oldest kit? I wasn't even aware he had a third one XD

Or....are there even more of them
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Sounds good^^  That wraps the kit up pretty nicely then.

His oldest kit was basically the crystal venom one without the crystal venom and he had permarylais after the first Q on every follow-up Q.  
It was very very hard to reach people but once you did (you'd flash usually)... 
well lets just say they weren't running.  Also the E proc used to heal.
The W shield was quite small so it could be popped, and since it only scaled with ap, 
building tank was sub-optimal.
(now has health scaling which my Skarner-maining brother was most pleased with^^)

You can give him more CC and adjust E, give him a passive to help with mana management (he'll need without the current passive), or give him a passive like grave's original passive that granted resistances the longer you were in combat. 

Considering that Skarner has a harder and harder time closing on targets each season, more armor/MR would be greatly appreciated, IMO.
He REALLY doesn't need mana management, he doesn't need the CURRENT mana from the rocks thanks to the introduction of Talisman. Its a wasteful drain on his power budget.

Pretty much what the other guy said. Skarner doesn't have mana issues even without the spires
A base/scaling increase to his armour/mr would be nice, but not made part of his kit as you'd struggle to fit it in without overloading him
Why do you care what's written in the passive case? What's important is the kit as a whole, not what's written in the individual small cases.

His entire kit is built around that passive.
That is the problem.

You miss my point.

If the current passive was removed and replaced by MS on Q (as LostFrost suggested), you seem to complain that the passive "box" would not contain any text anymore. But why do you care, what's written in this little box, if the kit as a whole is more cohesive and better after this modification. You don't have a quota of text in each box to fulfill...
